title: Dataview Integration
description: Integrate Wand with Dataview plugin (3.5M+ downloads) - use DQL queries as plan inputs
notes:
Phase 1 Complete: Core Dataview integration implemented.

Files created:
- src/services/DataviewService.ts - High-level API wrapper with typed methods
- Updated src/services/ToolsLayer.ts - Added dataview.* tool implementations
- Updated src/types/ActionPlan.ts - Added Dataview tool types
- Updated src/schemas/toolSchemas.ts - Added Zod schemas for Dataview tools
- Updated src/services/PlanGenerator.ts - Added Dataview tools to system prompt and read-only tools list

New tools available:
- dataview.status - Check if Dataview is available
- dataview.query - Execute any DQL query
- dataview.pages - Get pages matching a source
- dataview.tasks - Query tasks across the vault

Remaining work:
- Natural language to DQL conversion (optional enhancement)
- More sophisticated integration patterns
